rnaseq_experiments.author: Anna V. Klepikova, Artem S. Kasianov, Evgeny S. Gerasimov, Maria D. Logacheva, Aleksey A. Penin

bam_file.desc: IN.sn, First elongated internode (from last rosette leaf to first cauline leaf). Sample was collected when first silique was yellow and ready to open.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Senescent internode

bam_file.desc: SL.sn2, Whole senescent silique 2. Sample was collected when first silique was yellow and ready to open.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Senescent silique 2

bam_file.desc: POD.sn1, Pod of the senescent silique 1. Sample was collected when first silique was yellow and ready to open.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Pod of the senescent silique 1

bam_file.desc: SD.sn1, Seeds from the senescent silique 1. Sample was collected when first silique was yellow and ready to open.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seeds from the senescent silique 1

bam_file.desc: SD.g3, Seeds at third day after soaking.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Germinating seeds 3

bam_file.desc: SD.g2, Seeds at second day after soaking.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Germinating seeds 2

bam_file.desc: SD.g1, Seeds at first day after soaking.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Germinating seeds 1

bam_file.desc: SD.d, Dry seeds.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Dry Seeds

bam_file.desc: POD.y6-7, Pistils of 6th and 7th flowers (before pollination), ovules and stigma removed. Sample collected at the moment of the abscission of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Carpel of 6th and 7th flowers

bam_file.desc: STI, Stigmatic tissue from pistils of 6th and 7th flowers (before pollination). Sample collected at the moment of the abscission of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Stigmatic tissue

bam_file.desc: OV.y6-7, Ovules from 6th and 7th flowers (before pollination). Sample collected at the moment of the abscission of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Ovules from 6th and 7th flowers

bam_file.desc: SD.y5, Seeds from silique 5. All samples of this series were taken at the moment of abscission of the first flower. Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Young seeds 5

bam_file.desc: SD.y4, Seeds from silique 4. All samples of this series were taken at the moment of abscission of the first flower. Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Young seeds 4

bam_file.desc: SD.y3, Seeds from silique 3. All samples of this series were taken at the moment of abscission of the first flower. Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Young seeds 3

bam_file.desc: SD.y2, Seeds from silique 2. All samples of this series were taken at the moment of abscission of the first flower. Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Young seeds 2

bam_file.desc: SD.y1, Seeds from silique 1. All samples of this series were taken at the moment of abscission of the first flower. Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Young seeds 1

bam_file.desc: SL8, Whole silique 8. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Silique 8

bam_file.desc: POD7, Pod of the silique 7 without seeds. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.

bam_file.desc: POD1, Pod of the silique 1 without seeds. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.

bam_file.desc: SD1, Seeds from silique 1. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seeds 1

bam_file.desc: IN, First elongated internode (from last rosette leaf to first cauline leaf). All samples are collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Internode

bam_file.desc: AX, Axis of the inflorescence without flowers and pedicels. All samples are collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Axis of the inflorescence

bam_file.desc: PED, Pedicel of the first flower. All samples are collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Pedicel

bam_file.desc: F19+, Whole inflorescence apex from flower 19 to meristem. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 19 and following

bam_file.desc: F15-18, Whole flowers 15, 16, 17 and 18 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 15-18

bam_file.desc: F12-14, Whole flowers 12, 13 and 14 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 12-14

bam_file.desc: F9-11, Whole flowers 9, 10 and 11 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 9-11

bam_file.desc: F6-8, Whole flowers 6, 7 and 8 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 6-8

bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flower 5

bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flower 3

bam_file.desc: F2, Whole flower 2 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flower 2

bam_file.desc: F1, Whole flower 1 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flower 1

bam_file.desc: F.SP.y, Sepals of young flower (at stage 9 according to Smyth et al., 1990). Sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Sepals of the young flower

bam_file.desc: F.AN.y, Anthers of young flower (at stage 9 according to Smyth et al., 1990). Sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Anthers of the young flower

bam_file.desc: F.CA.y, Pistil of young flower (at stage 9 according to Smyth et al., 1990). Sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Carpels of the young flower

bam_file.desc: F.SP.ad, Sepals of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Sepals of the mature flower

bam_file.desc: F.PT.ad, Petals of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Petals of the mature flower

bam_file.desc: F.FM.ad, Filaments of stamens of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Stamen filaments of the mature flower

bam_file.desc: F.AN.ad, Anthers of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Anthers of the mature flower (F.AN.ad)

bam_file.desc: F.CA.ad, Pistil of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Carpels of the mature flower (before pollination)

bam_file.desc: F.AN, Anthers of first flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Opened Anthers

bam_file.desc: L.VN.sn, Midrib of the third leaf. Sample was collected when first silique was completely mature and nearly opened. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Vein of the senescent leaf

bam_file.desc: L.PET.sn, Petiole of the third leaf. Sample was collected when first silique was completely mature and nearly opened. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole of the senescent leaf

bam_file.desc: L.lg, Whole third leaf. Sample was collected at the moment of anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf, mature

bam_file.desc: L.LAM.lg, Parts of the leaf blade without veins. Sample was collected at the moment of anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Lamina of the mature leaf

bam_file.desc: L.VN.lg, Midrib of the third leaf. Sample was collected at the moment of anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Vein of the mature leaf

bam_file.desc: L.PET.lg, Petiole of the third leaf. Sample was collected at the moment of anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole of the mature leaf

bam_file.desc: L.LAM.i2, Parts of the leaf blade without veins. Sample was collected at 12th day after germination (10 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Lamina, intermediate 2

bam_file.desc: L.VN.i2, Midrib of the third leaf. Sample was collected at 12th day after germination (10 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Vein, intermediate 2

bam_file.desc: L.PET.i2, Petiole of third leaf. Sample was collected at 12th day after germination (10 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole, intermediate 2

bam_file.desc: L.LAM.i1, Leaf blade of the third leaf. Sample was harvested at 9th day after germination (5 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).

bam_file.desc: L.PET.i1, Petiole of the third leaf. Sample was collected at 9th day after germination (5 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole, intermediate 1

bam_file.desc: L.LAM.y, Leaf blade of the third leaf. Sample was collected at 7th day after germination (3 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).

bam_file.desc: L.PET.y, Petiole of the third leaf. Sample was collected at 7th day after germination (3 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole of the young leaf

bam_file.desc: R, Root without apex, collected from plants at 7th day after germination.

bam_file.desc: R.A, Apex of the root, collected from plants at 7th day after germination.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Root Apex

bam_file.desc: S.R, Root of one-day old seedling. Immediately before collection seedlings were gently pulled out of soil and washed under fresh water.

bam_file.desc: S.C, Cotyledons of one-day-old seedling, collected with petioles.

bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seedling Meristem

bam_file.desc: S.H, Hypocotyl of one-day-old seedling from place of the attachment of cotyledons to the beginning of root.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seedling Hypocotyl

bam_file.desc: SD5, Seeds from silique 5. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seeds 5

bam_file.desc: SL4, Whole silique 4. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Silique 4

bam_file.desc: POD3, Pod of the silique 3 without seeds. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Pod of the silique 3

bam_file.desc: SD3, Seeds from silique 3. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seeds 3

bam_file.desc: SL2, Whole silique 2. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Silique 2

bam_file.desc: POD1, Pod of the silique 1 without seeds. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Pod of the silique 1

bam_file.desc: SD1, Seeds from silique 1. All samples of this series were taken at the moment when first silique is 1-1.5 cm long (corresponds to the moment of the abscission of the 8th flower). Before collection, siliques were washed in RNAlater solution in order to remove pollen.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seeds 1

bam_file.desc: IN, First elongated internode (from last rosette leaf to first cauline leaf). All samples are collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Internode

bam_file.desc: AX, Axis of the inflorescence without flowers and pedicels. All samples are collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Axis of the inflorescence

bam_file.desc: PED, Pedicel of the first flower. All samples are collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Pedicel

bam_file.desc: F19+, Whole inflorescence apex from flower 19 to meristem. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 19 and following

bam_file.desc: F15-18, Whole flowers 15, 16, 17 and 18 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 15-18

bam_file.desc: F12-14, Whole flowers 12, 13 and 14 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 12-14

bam_file.desc: F9-11, Whole flowers 9, 10 and 11 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 9-11

bam_file.desc: F6-8, Whole flowers 6, 7 and 8 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flowers 6-8

bam_file.desc: F5, Whole flower 5 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flower 5

bam_file.desc: F4, Whole flower 4 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flower 4

bam_file.desc: F3, Whole flower 3 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flower 3

bam_file.desc: F2, Whole flower 2 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flower 2

bam_file.desc: F1, Whole flower 1 without pedicel. All samples of this series were collected at moment of the anthesis of the first flower.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Flower 1

bam_file.desc: F.SP.y, Sepals of young flower (at stage 9 according to Smyth et al., 1990). Sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Sepals of the young flower

bam_file.desc: F.AN.y, Anthers of young flower (at stage 9 according to Smyth et al., 1990). Sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Anthers of the young flower

bam_file.desc: F.CA.y, Pistil of young flower (at stage 9 according to Smyth et al., 1990). Sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Carpels of the young flower

bam_file.desc: F.SP.ad, Sepals of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Sepals of the mature flower

bam_file.desc: F.PT.ad, Petals of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Petals of the mature flower

bam_file.desc: F.FM.ad, Filaments of stamens of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Stamen filaments of the mature flower

bam_file.desc: F.AN.ad, Anthers of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Anthers of the mature flower (before opening)

bam_file.desc: F.CA.ad, Pistil of the third flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Carpels of the mature flower (before pollination)

bam_file.desc: F.AN, Anthers of first flower; sample collected at the moment of the anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Opened Anthers

bam_file.desc: L.VN.sn, Midrib of the third leaf. Sample was collected when first silique was completely mature and nearly opened. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Vein of the senescent leaf

bam_file.desc: L.PET.sn, Petiole of the third leaf. Sample was collected when first silique was completely mature and nearly opened. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole of the senescent leaf

bam_file.desc: L.lg, Whole third leaf. Sample was collected at the moment of anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf, mature

bam_file.desc: L.LAM.lg, Parts of the leaf blade without veins. Sample was collected at the moment of anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Lamina of the mature leaf

bam_file.desc: L.VN.lg, Midrib of the third leaf. Sample was collected at the moment of anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Vein of the mature leaf

bam_file.desc: L.PET.lg, Petiole of the third leaf. Sample was collected at the moment of anthesis of the first flower. All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole of the mature leaf

bam_file.desc: L.LAM.i2, Parts of the leaf blade without veins. Sample was collected at 12th day after germination (10 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Lamina, intermediate 2

bam_file.desc: L.VN.i2, Midrib of the third leaf. Sample was collected at 12th day after germination (10 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Vein, intermediate 2

bam_file.desc: L.PET.i2, Petiole of third leaf. Sample was collected at 12th day after germination (10 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole, intermediate 2

bam_file.desc: L.LAM.i1, Leaf blade of the third leaf. Sample was harvested at 9th day after germination (5 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Lamina, intermediate 1

bam_file.desc: L.PET.i1, Petiole of the third leaf. Sample was collected at 9th day after germination (5 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole, intermediate 1

bam_file.desc: L.LAM.y, Leaf blade of the third leaf. Sample was collected at 7th day after germination (3 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Lamina of the young leaf

bam_file.desc: L.PET.y, Petiole of the third leaf. Sample was collected at 7th day after germination (3 mm leaf). All leaf samples were taken from the third leaf, if other not indicated. Samples were collected at 5 stages: 7 days after germination (young, ~ 3mm in length), 9 days after germination (intermediate 1, ~ 5 mm in length), 12 days after germination (intermediate 2, ~ 10 mm in length), at the moment of anthesis of the first flower (mature leaf) and at the stage of maturation of seeds in first siliques (senescent leaf).
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Leaf Petiole of the young leaf

bam_file.desc: R, Root without apex, collected from plants at 7th day after germination.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Root

bam_file.desc: R.A, Apex of the root, collected from plants at 7th day after germination.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Root Apex

bam_file.desc: S.R, Root of one-day old seedling. Immediately before collection seedlings were gently pulled out of soil and washed under fresh water.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seedling Root

bam_file.desc: S.C, Cotyledons of one-day-old seedling, collected with petioles.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seedling Cotyledons

bam_file.desc: S.M, Seedling shoot apical meristem with adjacent tissues.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seedling Meristem

bam_file.desc: S.H, Hypocotyl of one-day-old seedling from place of the attachment of cotyledons to the beginning of root.
bam_file.title: Arabidopsis thaliana Seedling Hypocotyl
